text:
Jens Bertil Georg Nilsson (25 September 1948 – 13 March 2018) was a Swedish politician. He served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for Sweden from 2009 to 2018. He was a member of the Social Democrats, part of the Progressive Alliance of Socialists and Democrats.
Nilsson died on 13 March 2018 in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 69.

annotations.surface_form: Progressive Alliance of Socialists and Democrats
